content: I can provide an objective analysis based on historical data and statistics. it is highly likely that the injuries to klay thompson and james wiseman will affect the golden state warriors' roster depth this season. thompson, who missed the entire 2020-2021 season due to injury, is one of the team's top scorers and perimeter defenders. wiseman, on the other hand, was a highly-touted rookie last season and showed promise as a big man with elite athleticism and shot-blocking ability before getting injured. without these two key players, the warriors' depth will be tested, and other players will need to step up and fill the void. the warriors' bench will have to play a more significant role, and players like jordan poole, otto porter jr., and andre iguodala will need to take on a larger workload to ensure that the team can still compete at a high level in the highly competitive western conference.
